trans-unit.source: Represents an element on a page that can be linked to from other documents or other places in the same document.

The names of all of the link targets for all of the pages in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> are gathered into the Page Content part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
This enables consuming applications to determine if a particular target is in a particular document without having to load the entire document.

For more information about the `<PageContent>` and `<LinkTarget>` elements, see chapter 3 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the name of the element that this <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"></xref> identifies as a linkable element.

The names of all of the link targets for all of the pages in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> are gathered into the Page Content part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
This enables consuming applications to determine if a particular target is in a particular document without having to load the entire document.

For more information about the `<PageContent>` and `<LinkTarget>` elements, see chapter 3 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

A <xref:System.String> that is identical to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name*> property of the markup element that corresponds to this <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"></xref> element.
